channel.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India
channel.description: World News: TOI brings the latest world news headlines, Current International breaking news world wide. In depth analysis and top news headlines world wide.
channel.copyright: Copyright:(C) Mon, 04 Nov 2024 02:23:06 IST Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd, http://in.indiatimes.com/policyterms/1554651.cms

image.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: Piers Morgan reveals who he thinks will win the US 2024 election: 'Tiger Woods of politics is...'
item.description: Veteran UK broadcaster Piers Morgan predicts Donald Trump's potential victory in the upcoming election as the greatest comeback, likening it to Tiger Woods' return. He emphasizes Trump's energy, despite his age, and his perceived competence on economic and immigration issues over Kamala Harris. Morgan also mentions Trump's impactful, albeit blunt, communication style.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Donald Trump reacts to shocking Iowa poll, calls Ann Selzer a 'hater'
item.description: Kamala Harris leads Donald Trump in conservative Iowa according to a new Selzer poll, putting her at 47% compared to Trump's 44%. Trump criticized the poll and its methodology, calling it biased. However, pollster Ann Selzer defended her historical accuracy. Nate Silver also noted the poll's boldness but expressed skepticism about its accuracy.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Kamala Harris' husband says young men might be taken by Trump's 'fun side'
item.description: Kamala Harris' husband Doug Emhoff said many young men might be taken by Trump's fun side but that's not really who the former president is. In an MSNBC interview, Emhoff said he talks to young men about the real side of Donald Trump, not the 'dancing, going to the wrestling match' Donald Trump. "I think Cardi B called this out that it's all hustle." The Democrat presidential candidate's husband said his appeal to the young men is to do their research.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: What time does counting of votes start in different US time zones (ET, CT, MT, PT)?
item.description: The counting of the votes in the US election extends beyond election night, and the timing will vary from state to state. The US has four main time zones( Eastern Time, Central, Mountain, and Pacific Standard Time), and the election timing is also different among the time zones. Many states had early voting though November 5 is the election day. Results are expected to start coming in just hours after the first polls close at 6pm ET.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: New polls say Trump leading Harris in every swing state amid shock Iowa finding in US election
item.description: Daily Beast report said after the shock poll, betting markets tilted towards Kamala Harris. Kalshi's betting market on Saturday gave Trump a 55 per cent chance of winning on Saturday but on Sunday morning that fell to 50 per cent. On Polymark, Trump was at 63 per cent on Saturday but on Sunday morning, he tumbled down to 56 per cent. PredictIt gave Harris breathing room after the Iowa poll.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Pittsburgh 'Hamas operative' arrested for vandalising Jewish buildings; donations to Squad Democrats revealed
item.description: FBI and Pittsburgh police arrested two locals for hate crimes, involving vandalism on Jewish buildings. Mohamad Hamad, a member of the Pennsylvania Air National Guard, tested explosives and claimed to be a Hamas operative. Talya Lubit, his accomplice, assisted in the pro-Hamas graffiti on Jewish facilities.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: MAGA supporters furious that SNL ripped off Trump's 2015 skit: 'Is there anything she won’t copy?'
item.description: In the 2015 show, Jimmy Fallon portrayed Trump and the two Trumps discussed preparation for the then-second Republican Primary Debate, creating jobs, immigration, taxes etc. “Kamala ripped off the same bit Trump did when he was on Saturday Night Live in 2015 …and Trump’s was double the length,” radio host Ari Hoffman said on X.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Severe storms ravage Oklahoma: 6 injured, several homes damaged; thousands without power
item.description: Intense storms and tornadoes hit Oklahoma early Sunday, causing extensive damage and leaving around 86,000 without electricity. Officials reported several injuries and significant property damage, including flipped vehicles and damaged roofs. Emergency shelters were set up for affected residents. The city remained at risk for further heavy rainfall and thunderstorms.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: How Kamala Harris’ campaign redefined Hilary Clinton’s playbook against Donald Trump
item.description: Kamala Harris's presidential campaign diverges from Hillary Clinton's by emphasizing pragmatic policies over breaking gender barriers. Harris focuses on her record and specific issues like immigration reform, avoiding direct clashes with Trump and underplaying her historic candidacy, while grassroots supporters highlight her identity.
item.dc:creator: Aarushi Batra

item.title: Poll Nostradamus Allan Lichtman vs Nate Silver: Who predicts US election 2024 accurately?
item.description: Allan Lichtman is a historian and predicted the past nine out of 10 elections correctly except the race between George W Bush and Al Gore. Nate Silver is a statistician and his model gained popularity after he rightly predicted the result in 49 states out of 50 in 2008. Their methods are different and while Lichtman's prediction is a Kamala Harris victory, Nate Silver said his gut feeling is Donald Trump would win.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Epstein claimed Trump cuckolded his best friends, slept with Melania first on 'Lolita Express'
item.description: In the recordings, Epstein called Trump "charming" and "always fun" but he alleged Trump was a serial cheat in his marriages and loved to "f*** the wives of his best friends". Trump had many friends but at heart, he was a friendless man, Epstein said. He also alleged that Trump had had a scalp reduction surgery for baldness.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trump says if Kamala wins 'you are 3 days away from Great Depression'
item.description: During a rally in North Carolina, Donald Trump claimed that a Kamala Harris victory would lead to a Great Depression, while his win would ensure economic prosperity. Trump criticized Harris as weak, mocked her refusal to appear on Joe Rogan's podcast. “She will get overwhelmed, meltdown, and millions of people will die, perhaps. This is not a charity event. This is an election for the biggest and toughest job anywhere in the world.”
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Nate Silver reacts to shocking Iowa poll: 'Somebody is going to be wrong'
item.description: Trump won Iowa both in 2016 and 2020 making Iowa a ruby-red state. But the nationally recognized poll shows Kamala Harris has picked up support from Iowa women -- probably on the abortion issue. Robert F Kennedy Jr who abandoned his independent presidential campaign will remain on the Iowa ballot and he got three per cent of the vote which is down from six per cent in September and nine per cent in June.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'If Peanut was an illegal immigrant raping women...': MAGA social media explodes against New York officials
item.description: Mark Longo, a wildlife enthusiast and self-taught rehabilitator, had amassed a large online following by sharing content about his animal sanctuary, P'Nuts Freedom Farm, where Peanut was a prominent fixture. Peanut, an affectionate and playful squirrel, was first rescued by Longo after he witnessed Peanut’s mother die in a car accident. Peanut quickly became a beloved personality, not only in Longo’s home but also on social media, where fans connected deeply with his story of survival and his relationship with Longo. However, the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation (DEC), alongside the county health department, received reports alleging that Longo was illegally keeping wild animals as pets and housing them in conditions that posed potential risks for rabies.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trick or steal: Women caught on camera stealing Halloween candies, decorations in Canada
item.description: In Markham, Ontario, a woman was caught on camera stealing Halloween candy meant for children, quickly going viral and sparking outrage on social media. Harrison Faulkner shared the footage, which has garnered significant views. In a similar incident, American musician Cody Tate posted about adults taking candy intended for kids from outside his home.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Why did New York officials euthanize Peanut the Squirrel? Here's what happened
item.description: New York officials seized and euthanized a pet squirrel named Peanut, causing outrage and support for owner Mark Longo. Peanut was a social media sensation and symbol for Longo's animal sanctuary. Authorities cited concerns about rabies, with Peanut allegedly biting an officer. The incident sparked online backlash from public figures, including Elon Musk.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Special moments': Justin Trudeau visits temples in Canada to celebrate Diwali
item.description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau shared glimpses from Diwali celebrations with the community, visiting temples and engaging in festivities. He highlighted the festival's message of light over darkness. This comes amid rising tensions between Canada and India, following accusations related to the killing of Hardeep Singh Nijjar.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Keep Kamala and carry-on-la': Harris makes hilarious appearance on 'Saturday Night Live'; watch video
item.description: Kamala Harris made a surprise comedic appearance on 'Saturday Night Live' alongside Maya Rudolph, who portrayed her. In their exchange, they humorously discussed shared experiences and took jabs at Donald Trump. The duo, dressed identically, urged supporters to continue backing Harris while ending the segment with the classic 'SNL' sign-off.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Treated me like terrorist, drug dealer': Euthanised squirrel Peanut's owner says his house was ransacked for five hours
item.description: Mark Longo, owner of a pet squirrel named Peanut, reports a five-hour raid on his home by government agents, seizing his pets. Officials claim Peanut bit someone and must be tested for rabies, but Longo denies it, seeking further investigation. Peanut's rescue story and widespread social media fame highlight his significance to Longo's animal rescue organization.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Women of America v Donald Trump: Liberals triggered by MAGA leader's 'execution fantasy'
item.description: Arizona attorney general Kris Mayes is investigating whether Donald Trump's comments about Liz Cheney constitute a death threat. The controversial remarks have sparked significant outrage among Democratic women, with Kamala Harris condemning such rhetoric.
item.dc:creator: Chidanand Rajghatta
